nodes.text: Calima Squadron was a secretive starfighter squadron formed by Bail Organa as part of one of the earliest rebel cells created on the planet Crait. The squadron undertook missions to sabotage outposts of the Galactic Empire across the galaxy. The squadron's starships were red with white stripes.
The colors of Calima Squadron is one of the cosmetic options available to customize New Republic starfighters in the 2020 game Star Wars: Squadrons.
